snippet: At a church service in Killeen, Tex., soldiers were remembered, as policy makers elsewhere debated what changes might help prevent another mass shooting.
abstract: Congregants at St Joseph Catholic Church in Killeen, Tex, pray for soldiers killed at nearby Fort Hood Army base and their families, as policy makers nationwide debate what changes in military policy might help prevent another mass shooting.

byline.original: By ALAN BLINDER and MANNY FERNANDEZ
byline.contributor: Elena Schneider contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: At a church service in Killeen, Tex., soldiers were remembered, as policy makers elsewhere debated what changes might help prevent another mass shooting.

headline.main: A Community Mourns Soldiers Killed in Fort Hood Rampage
headline.print_headline: A Community Mourns Soldiers Killed in Fort Hood Rampage

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
